content: Verdant Glow is in the secret area in Chapter 4 called Purple Cloud Mountain. To reach this area, you must first defeat the Venom Daoist in the chamber to the right of the Pool of Shattered Jade Keeper's Shrine. From there, revisit him again in an empty room on a path branching off to the right of the Temple of Yellow Flowers. Defeat him to unlock the secret area.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Verdant_Glow_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Verdant Glow Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Verdant Glow Location'.
The content is as follows:
Verdant Glow is in the secret area in Chapter 4 called Purple Cloud Mountain. To reach this area, you must first defeat the Venom Daoist in the chamber to the right of the Pool of Shattered Jade Keeper's Shrine. From there, revisit him again in an empty room on a path branching off to the right of the Temple of Yellow Flowers. Defeat him to unlock the secret area.
